availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p: Personally appeared before me, William Brooks, a Justice of the Peace in and for said county. and State aforesaid; Sidney T. Douglas to me well known, who being by me duly sworn, according to Law, deposeth and saith, that he will well and truly to the best of his Knowledge and Information, Execute the duties of Commissioner for the State of Kentucky, according to the Laws thereof.

Sidney T Douglas
Commissioner for Kentucky.
-- in Alabama --
Sworn and Subscribed to before me, at the City of Mobile, on this sixteenth day of November A. D. 1865.}

Wilim Brooks
J P M C

figure.ab:
S. T. DOUGLAS,
COMMISSIONER FOR
Kentucky
MOBILE, ALA.

body.p:
Comr Deeds
Alabama
oath of Sidney T. Douglas
